meaningMnemonic:
This is the noun version of the kanji <kanji>celebrate</kanji>, so it means <vocabulary>celebration</vocabulary>! 

お祝い is also used to mean a <vocabulary>congratulatory gift</vocabulary> itself.
readingMnemonic: Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading. You learned this reading already so you should be able to read it!
